text: Kare-ra no nakaniha, jibun no shita de keiten o yugame, keiten ni nai koto o keiten no ichibudearu ka no yō ni, anata gata ni omowa seyou to suru ippa ga aru. Mata kare-ra wa, arrā no omoto karade wanai mono o,`soreha arrā kara kitamonoda.' To iu. Kare-ra wa koi ni arrā ni tsuite kyogi o kataru monodearu
